analysis.description:
VIUREFoundersTokenSale.transfer_funds_to_project (/unique_chucks/22/0x5088c2985210925d15ea470a160fc08b352818d0.sol#97-106) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! project_wallet.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/22/0x5088c2985210925d15ea470a160fc08b352818d0.sol#105-106)

VIUREFoundersTokenSale.transfer_remaining_funds_to_project (/unique_chucks/22/0x5088c2985210925d15ea470a160fc08b352818d0.sol#133-140) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! project_wallet.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/22/0x5088c2985210925d15ea470a160fc08b352818d0.sol)

VIUREFoundersTokenSale.transfer_funds_to_project (/unique_chucks/22/0x5088c2985210925d15ea470a160fc08b352818d0.sol#97-106) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0

VIUREFoundersTokenSale.transfer_funds_to_project (/unique_chucks/22/0x5088c2985210925d15ea470a160fc08b352818d0.sol#97-106) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0
VIUREFoundersTokenSale.transfer_remaining_funds_to_project (/unique_chucks/22/0x5088c2985210925d15ea470a160fc08b352818d0.sol#133-140) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0
